body:
On MacOSX-10.13.4 and clang-9.1.0-apple compiler, an older version of spack (downloaded 7/10/2018) builds cmake-3.11.0 fine.

Using the same system with a later spack version (downloaded 8/3/2018) fails on cmake-3.11.0 build in bootstrap phase with error:

`The C++ compiler does not support C++11 (std::unique_ptr).`

The exact same package.py was used for both build processes (attached). 

[package.py.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/2258686/package.py.txt)
title: cmake build using clang fails with post 7/10/2018 branch
